<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the global namespace attached to user interface.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''uiNamespace'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Namespace]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[uiNamespace]] [[setVariable]] ["LIB_interruptDisplay", _display];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[uiNamespace]] [[setVariable]] ["myVar", 46];
[[with]] [[uiNamespace]] [[do]] {
	[[hint]] [[str]] myVar; //46
};
</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[missionNamespace]], [[currentNamespace]], [[parsingNamespace]], [[profileNamespace]], [[localNamespace]], [[allVariables]], [[with]], [[do]], [[ArmA:_Editing#Forward_Compatibility|Forward Compatibility]]
</value></part></template>
